author: consuegs
body:
- Update of Millepede software version for tracker alignment calibration 
    
 - Introduction of `Intel oneMKL PARDISO` solution method. `PARDISO` is to become from now on the solution method of choice for (special) problems with really sparse global matrices    

 - See presentation [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1363492/#27-new-mp2-solution-method-par) at TrkAl meeting (09.01.2024) by C. Kleinwort with overview of method and performance summary from test campaign
title: Update Millepede to V04-14-00
